rows.name:
Concentrate attack on a single
enemy, incinerating them.

Absorb ether from the air and
transform it into fighting spirit.

Pillars of fire erupt from
beneath all enemies.

Fire concentrated arrows
of light at an enemy.

Slice an enemy multiple times
with a blade of light.

Move at light-speed to cut
the enemy instantaneously.

Blast a merciless siren
beam through enemies.

Attack hostiles with
a light-speed attack.

Pierce enemies with countless
light blades created by ether.

Drain enemies' life force, and
distribute it to allies.

Attack enemies with
a water shock wave.

Destroy enemies from within by
manipulating the power of regeneration.

Slash repeatedly by unleashing
your inner beast.

Attack enemies and heal allies
with a wave of ether.

Shoot forward all ether
collected by the rings.

Attack all within range with spinning
motion.

Shoot out a vortex of ether
created within the body.

Charge with jet propulsion
like a spinning drill.

Launch a large missile and
audaciously bomb the enemy.

Pulverize the enemy with a spinning
punch then an explosive uppercut.

Launch countless missiles while in
the air to mow down your enemies.

Shoot repeated slashing attacks
while maneuvering freely.

Mop up the enemy with a laser
blast in bombardment mode.

Overwhelm the enemy with
unlimited repeat attacks.

Spin your weapon round and incinerate
enemies within range.

Blue flames follow the
enemy and deal damage.

Swing round your weapon and
focus the attack on a single enemy.

Catch a lightning strike with your wand
and throw it out to attack enemies.

Manipulate an electrified weapon with
your wand and attack the enemy.

Smash your weapon into the ground
for a massive lightning explosion.

Combine the Dual Scythes and
throw them at the enemy.

Take the enemy by surprise
with acrobatic movements.

Create a giant vortex to suck
up the enemy in one go.

Slash enemies in Tonfa mode
and create a whirlwind.

Pierce the enemy countless
times in Sword mode.

Shoot out a whirlwind to collect
ether in Shield mode.

Release a shockwave from
your weapon in Shield mode.

Shoot in Bow mode
while flying back.

Cut up the enemy while spinning
horizontally in the air with a kama.

Perform a horizontal sweeping
three-pronged attack.

Smash the naginata into the ground
to send out a shockwave.

Release a strong slashing attack
with a backward somersault.

Soar into the air and attack with
black wings.

Deal serious damage simply
by twisting your fan.

Compress ether between two fans
and shoot it at the enemy.

Tear into the enemy at great speed,
haphazardly wielding your weapon.

Create a short sword from electric
ether and skewer the enemy.

Emits a mysterious light from
giant eyes on your wings.

Bash the hammer into the ground
and set off a shockwave.

Release ether in one burst,
attacking indiscriminately.

Wield four weapons and shower
the enemy with blows.

Throw out a ball of condensed
energy from your right hand.

Go on a rampage, bowling
over the enemy.

Hit the ground with ether collected
between both fists.

Gather ether in the Chroma Katana and
release it as you draw the blade.

Use a flying kick to dissolve the
enemy's composure then tear them up.

Perform a series of quick draw slashes
the moment you engage the enemy.

Attack by grasping your shield and
thrusting forward with all your might.

Create a shock wave and ice pillar
to overwhelm the enemy.

Release all power and cause
a massive ice explosion.

Shoot out absorbed
energy in a laser blast.

Fly up and perform a drop
attack with maximum power.
Attack by spraying out dark ether.

At the moment of movement, perform
quick draw cuts at visible speed.

Adopt a quick draw pose, then in an
instant slash all enemies in range.

Condense water ether and attack
all enemies over a wide range.

Attack by shooting out water ether
from your spinning weapon.

After high-speed spinning slashes,
launch a giant water pillar.

Calmly draw near the enemy and
perform intense slashing attacks.

Pursue a downed enemy with a kick
and perform spinning slashes.

Spread maximum ether and
incinerate everything.

Cover your whole body with
wind ether and charge.

Chew a Bitball and shoot
out balls of energy.

Shoot out a laser while in the
air and eradicate your enemies.

Kick a Bitball three
times while spinning.

Release a shockwave while
spinning a Bitball.

Massively enlarge a Bitball
and roll it over the enemy.

Condense dark ether
until it explodes.

Hit the shield while in the air, and
emit a large amount of healing.

Enter unconscious state with the mask
and draw out your true power.

Transform ether into bubble
form and spray it forward.

Gather ether on your weapon and shoot
it out as a powerful current of water.

Use water ether to attack with
high-speed repeated thrusts.

After throwing ice knives, attack with
slashes.

Release a powerful somersault kick
after three repeat attacks.

With one slash, smash an ice pillar
and attack enemies over a wide area.

Use ice ether to attack with
a series of high-speed stabs.

Swing your weapon round above your
head to create a giant block of ice.

Create a giant ice lance and use
it in an extra powerful charge.

Do lively jumps and smash your
weapon into the ground.

Give heart-shaped electric ether
to your enemies as a present.

Release a powerful flying kick
while spinning your weapon.

Throw your weapon spinning into
the air so it shoots out lasers.

Ether becomes a dark hand that rises
out of the ground to attack the enemy.

Throw your weapon into the air and
spray bullets to annihilate the enemy.

Beary swipes his ice claws
and mows down the enemy.

Beary attacks the enemy
with an ice shockwave.

Beary spins round and overwhelms
all enemies in range.

Change ether into flaming slashes
that shoot out ahead.

Wrap the Chroma Katana in flames
and cut enemies ahead in two.

After dealing a series of violent
punches, cut enemies in two.

Shoot out your own ether
as a shockwave.

Rush in wielding a weapon
of concentrated ether.

Kit and Sunny emit
a laser beam.

Explode a giant ball of
water ether in mid-air.

Fly up in the bath and
attack indiscriminately.

Swing your weapon round your
head and release a shockwave.

Throw your weapon about randomly
and cause a lightning explosion.

Kick a ball and lightning will
strike where it bounces.

Compress wind ether and
blow away the enemy.

Create a vacuum with high-speed
chops and kicks.

Hit the enemy with a series
of compressed air kicks.

Hit the ground while cheerfully
jumping and bounding.

Charge forward after charging
up electric ether.

Create thunder clouds and attack
enemies in range with lightning strikes.

Gently raise the axe overhead
then bring it down crashing.

Quickly raise the axe overhead
and attack quickly.

Fly around cutting up the enemy
with powerful slash attacks.

Swing the hammer and
hit ether balls.

Attack enemies within range while
jumping and spinning your weapon.

After jumping up in the sky, crash
into the ground at high speed.

Put your enemies into a hornet's
nest by spraying out bullets.

Develop the Hilbert Effect and
change the course of battle.

After charging energy, shoot
out scattered laser beams.

Launch homing missiles from
your weapon and tail.

Release maximum electric ether
and cause a huge explosion.

Remove limiter and charge the
enemy, exterminating them.

Slap the enemy with the side of your
weapon, then go on the attack.

Seal enemy movements and pierce with
the lance as far as possible.

Throw your weapon twice, then
hit the enemy with a drop attack.

The thrown weapon spins
and cuts up the enemy.

Swing the weapon down with
all your strength as if digging.

Attack the enemy by smashing
up a crystal.

Lift foot up high and throw the
ball as hard as possible.

Kiss and attack with a
ball filled with ether.

Charge up a Bitball on an ice stage,
then attack.

Scare the enemy with crescent
moon slashes, then pounce.

Attack by dropping down an
ether blade from above.

Slash up enemies in range while
spinning your weapon.

Jump up and throw your Megalance
down to the side.

Spin your weapon at high speed,
dealing countless slash attacks.

Create countless ether balls
to attack the enemy.

Launch two missiles at once
to attack the enemy.

Jump into the air and fire a shot
with an elemental attribute.

Float your weapon and mow down
all enemies within range with a laser.

Charge in with your shield and
perform a follow-on attack.

Attack by throwing your
weapon like a disc.

Hit the ground with all your might
to attack with a shockwave.

Attack with a shockwave, then
follow on with an ether slash attack.

Slash at the enemy repeatedly, not
allowing them chance to defend.

Attack with a shockwave and repeated
slashes of your blade.

Throw a condensed ball of
ether which explodes.

Attack by repeatedly bashing
your enemy with the ball.

Attacks with a Bitball, absorbing
ether which is used to heal you.

Launch your Knuckle Claws like
missiles to attack the enemy.

Charge forward in an instant and
overwhelm the enemy with a flurry.

Unleash a dive kick and cause
an ether explosion.

Smash your weapon into the ground
and release a shockwave in the area.

Smash your weapon into the ground
and charge into the enemy.

Swing your weapon with all your might
to attack enemies in range.

Use high-speed repeated stabs to
destroy the enemy to its core.

Fill your weapon with ether
and shoot it out as a laser.

Pierce the ground with your lance
tip to release a shockwave.

Emit a laser from your
overcharged weapon.

Charge at the enemy, then fire at close
range so it's difficult to avoid.

Spin while emitting a laser,
to mow down the enemy.

Throw a hammer so it spins at
high speed and hits the enemy.

Hit the ground with your weapon
and cause a shockwave.

Throw your weapon ahead and by
spinning it, attack enemies in range.

Attack with blade sheathed,
then draw and slash.

After throwing the scabbard from your
left hand, perform a slash attack.

Stomp on the ground, and perform a
quick draw cut with all your might.

Hit the ball into the ground and
cause a massive explosion.

Hit the ball with your fist so it
hits the enemy multiple times.

Swing the ball around, as if on a chain,
to hit enemies repeatedly.

Barge into the enemy then give them
a powerful uppercut while dazed.

Hit the ground with both fists to attack
the enemy with a powerful shockwave.

Daze the enemy with a tackle
then shoot your weapon.

Drop an ether blade from
above to attack.

After random slash attacks, perform
a powerful spinning slash.

Throw your weapon and adjust
its path to attack the enemy.

Create countless ether balls
to attack the enemy.

Jump up and throw your Megalance
down to the side.

Throw your weapon so it spins round,
hitting any enemy in range.

Float your weapon and launch
a giant ether ball.

Jump up into the air and
launch a homing missile.

Emit a laser from your
overcharged weapon.

A mid-air weapon drops down at
high speed, attacking the enemy.

Hit the ground with all your might,
attacking with a shockwave.

After swinging your weapon repeatedly,
finish off with a rising attack.

A two-stage attack where you slash
then attack with blade sheathed.

Heighten concentration and perform
a triple slash attack.

Perform a quick draw in the air then
release a massive slash attack.

Throw a condensed ball of
ether which explodes.

Unleash condensed ether above
the head to attack.

The ball bashes into the enemy
multiple times, damaging them.

Knuckle Claws fly out
matching your movements.

Combo move with a single punch
followed by a sharp kick.

Combo attack with a forward
somersault followed by a flying kick.

Control ether to attack the
enemy and heal allies.

Shoot out lasers from the rings
floating on both sides.

Attack repeatedly using the
ring held in the mouth.

Deliver a slashing attack, and follow it
up with a powerful kick.

Deliver a whirling blow followed by
a wild volley of shots.

Unleash a mid-air slash and then
unload your firearm at the enemy.

Transform your weapon into knuckle
claws and barrel into the enemy.

Transform your weapon into a cannon
and unload it into the enemy.

Unleash the combined power of Hana
Mk. II and Hanabuster on the enemy.

Brandish the Monado to generate
a mid-air shockwave.

Perform a rising spin to damage
enemies surrounding you.

A powerful slash using the true power
of the Monado.

Quickly close in on the enemy and
dice them into submission.

Charge up power, then unleash it in
a series of airborne spinning attacks.

Deliver a rising attack, followed up
with a strong downward blow.

Slash foes in the surrounding area
with blades made of light.

Lead with a mighty cleaving blow,
then follow-up with a cape swipe.

A dual-sword combo assault using
the power of Durandal.

Cram the Bitball full of ether,
then spin it and make it blow up.

Set off a series of ether explosions,
capped with one last big one.

Set up the Bitball, then spike it for
a truly giant boom.

Slide forward while concentrating fire
on the enemy.

Swing your swords downward to send
shockwaves flying at your foes.

Blast all enemies in the vicinity with
an unstoppable barrage of fire.

A boisterous flurry of strikes and
kicks that really puts the pressure on.

Push ahead with a series of open-palm
strikes.

Lead with a vicious flying kick,
then follow with the battle braid.

Cut the enemy to ribbons with a series
of quick, relentless slashes.

A combo attack of sword cuts and
ice spears delivered at absolute zero.

Unbalance your foe with a palm strike,
then follow up with powerful slashes.

Scatter wind ether projectiles over
a large area to deal damage.

Deploy numerous whirlwinds out in
front of you to lay waste to your foes.

Barrage your foe with razor-sharp wind,
then blow them away with a tornado.

Send the enemy flying with a
breathless onslaught of cuts.

Put all your momentum into a single
slash to blow the enemy away.

An unparalleled strike, backed by the
user's whole body and soul.

Launch a flurry of light-speed slashes,
then finish up with a spinning strike.

Charge your sword with ether energy,
then blast the enemy from mid-air.

A focused attack targeting a single
enemy to annihilate them.

Lead with a series of double-bladed
cuts, then barrage the foe with bullets.

Destroy your enemies using cuts and
shots delivered while spinning.

Slide into range, guns blazing, then
leap in for an all-out attack.

Unbalance the enemy with a flurry of
strikes, then rush them with full force.

Deploy a series of powerful slashes to
draw enemy attention on yourself.

Surge forward to break the enemies'
stances, then end with a mighty charge.

Slash at the enemy with flames, cast
while revolving relentlessly.

A blindingly fast series of cuts, followed
by an unstoppable cross-slash.

Spin sideways, slashing the enemy,
then immolate them with azure flame.

Slash against the enemy, then follow up
with a series of aerial kicks.

Forge ahead with sword strikes backed
up by waves of water ether energy.

Shoot energy waves from your sword,
then conclude with an overhead strike.
